knimeNode.name: ProteinProphet
knimeNode.shortDescription: KNIME node to perform ProteinProphet inference

fullDescription.intro: This node calls xinteract and ProteinProphet on the given pepXML file(s), using the given FASTA database and enzyme settings.
fullDescription.option: the enzyme used for digesting the proteins
the minimal peptide probability used for the ProteinProphet
prefix of to pin-down the decoy entries in the database

ports.inPort: The peptides in pepXML format, ready to be run by xinteract, i.e. the peptide probabilities should be calculated before.
The FASTA database file used for the peptide identification.
ports.outPort: protXML file containing the output of PeptideProphet.
TAB separated file containing the output of PeptideProphet.

views.view: The text sent to standard out during the execution of xinteract and PeptideProphet.

The text sent to standard error during the execution of xinteract and PeptideProphet. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
